title: Sunny memories of foreign lands /
author: Stowe, Harriet Beecher
snippet: It is stated in Lockhart's Life of Scott, that the ruins of this castle excited in Scott such delight and enthusiasm, that its owner urged him to accept for his lifetime the use of a small habitable house, enclosed within the circuit of the walls.
